Name: CrushBorgs
About the game: 'Run and Gun' oldschool single-player platformer with NES aesthetics, including an authentic 8-bit chiptune. Features: - 10 levels of non-stop action; - 4 dangerous bosses; - 2 playable characters with different weapons; - 7 weapons in total;
